title: Implement Analyze Agent
description:
Implement AnalyzeAgentModel class with prompt.

## Pattern (from otb-agents)
```python
from google.adk.agents import LlmAgent

ANALYZE_AGENT_PROMPT = """
You are an ad spend analysis agent. Analyze the provided ad performance data
and classify each ad/campaign as:
- GOOD: High performers to scale
- BAD: Wasteful spend to pause/reduce
- OK: Average performers to monitor
- WAIT: Not enough data yet

Use these thresholds:
- GOOD: ROAS >= 2x account avg, spend >= $1k, >= 7 days
- BAD: ROAS = 0 after $5k+/7d, or ROAS < 0.5x avg after $10k
- WAIT: < 7 days or < $1k spend

Return structured JSON with classifications and reasoning.
"""

class AnalyzeAgentModel:
    def __init__(self):
        self.agent = LlmAgent(
            name="analyze_agent",
            model="gemini-2.5-pro",
            description="Analyzes ad performance data",
            instruction=ANALYZE_AGENT_PROMPT,
            tools=[get_ad_data_tool],
            before_agent_callback=transform_ad_data,
        )
```
